name: Recent LastFm Tracks
author: SnnOoZe

sections.description:
This simple widget includes your LastFm recent tracks into the sidebar.

Enter your username and number of songs you want to show and it’s ok.

License

This plugin is free for everyone! Since it’s released under the GPL, you can use it free of charge on your personal or commercial blog.

Translations

English, French.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder ‘recent-last-fm-tracks’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place the widget to your desired sidebar
  4. Enter your LastFm username
  5. Enjoy!
